org.cryptacular.spec

Class CodecSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cryptacular.spec.CodecSpec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spec<Codec>

    public class CodecSpec
extends Object
implements Spec<Codec>
    Describes a string-to-byte encoding with methods to instantiate the appropriate Encoder/Decoder.
    Author:
    Marvin S. Addison
